It automatically tries to catch a wild Pokémon after defeating it if is the highest type of Pokéball active and there is a remaining supply in the Pokéball selector. ==Details== A specialized Pokéball to capture Pokémon with. It provides an increased catch rate on routes with fewer Pokémon defeated, and an increased catch rate in Dungeons with more time remaining.
